ui

Class TextUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.TextUI

  • public class TextUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple text-based user interface for the Minesweeper game.

      • printGrid

        public static void printGrid(java.lang.String[] strings)
        Display the contents of a string array representing a game grid on the console, marked with indices in the left and top margins.
        Parameters:
        strings - array of strings reprenting a grid
        revealAll - true if cell contents should be shown even if hidden
